Text: Viagens Interplanetarias:  Set in the future in the 21st and 22nd centuries, the series is named for the quasi-public Terran agency portrayed as monopolizing interstellar travel, the Brazilian-dominated "Viagens Interplanetarias" ("Interplanetary Voyages" or "Interplanetary Tours" in Portuguese).
Triplets:<Viagens Interplanetarias
